trans-unit.target: Erazi Syndicate
Unknown
Fight now or delay for 5 minutes?
Erazi Syndicate
If only you'd surrendered, my dear, we could have skirted this mess. Did you really think you stood half a chance?
Don't take it so hard, Commander. Defeat is something you should get used to.
Oh, Commander. You only see me as the villain because you're on the wrong side.
Lurking Doom
This is Governor Malick from the Maar Confederacy
This is Governor Malick from the Maar Confederacy
This is Governor Malick from the Maar Confederacy
Like every sun, Helio will rise again!
You've only succeeded in making me angry. For Grod, anger is energy!
I promise you, I'll be back -- with a plaque for your head!
Lurking Doom
Maar Confederacy
This is General Grod from the Helio Legion
This is General Grod from the Helio Legion
This is General Grod from the Helio Legion
I forgive you, but only because I like it rough.
Remember those human-skin shoes and belts my people used to wear? I can't wait to bring them back in style.
Not bad... for a primate.
Fly in the face of Helio -- and get burned!
Only the strong survive, and Grod is the strongest of all!
Soon, the rubble of your Command Center will mark only your grave.
Most impressive, Commander, but I was only testing your weaknesses. Let me assure you, I found plenty.
Smile while you may. Nothing lasts forever, least of all your teeth.
Revenge is best served cold. Rest assured, I'll soon have you frozen in carbonite.
Map is currently disabled. Fight off your attackers and try again
The destiny of any sun is to expand. And as Helio grows, so must the body count.
Give up hope, or have it wrenched from your broken fingers!
Bow to your new overlord! Kneel before Grod!
Best raise your white flag now, Commander -- lest it be you who are hanged.
There's no shame in surrendering, Commander. True embarrassment lies in having the floor mopped with that punching bag you call a face.
Still here, Commander? There's only one way you'll learn, and that's with my boot on your throat!
Ha! Is that all you've got?! Come now, Commander. Did you even try?
You renegade dregs are gluttons for punishment, and I'm all too happy to oblige.
Call me sadistic, but I find immense pleasure in your suffering.
This is Executrix Scylith from the Erazi Syndicate
This is Executrix Scylith from the Erazi Syndicate
This is Executrix Scylith from the Erazi Syndicate
Helio Legion
Helio Legion
Maar Confederacy
What a lovely base, Commander. It'd be a shame if anything were to happen to it.
Strength lies in numbers, Commander. All alone, you're dinner.
Surrender now, my dear, and you can still save lives -- beginning with your own!
